/usr/bin/c++    -DNON_MATLAB_PARSING -DMAX_EXT_API_CONNECTIONS=255 -D_linux -std=c++11 -pthread -lssl -lcrypto   -lssl -lcrypto CMakeFiles/robot2.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/robot2.dir/src/Simulator.cpp.o  -o bin/robot2 /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/liboctomap.so /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/liboctomath.so lib/libremote_api.a -lssl -lcrypto -ldl /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/liboctomap.so /opt/ros/kinetic/lib/liboctomath.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/kinetic/lib
